heading: HR02345
0: A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST MANNER THE RECENT HARASSMENT CASE OF THE CHINESE COAST GUARD AGAINST MEMBERS OF THE PHILIPPINE MEDIA AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO FILE A PROTEST AGAINST SIMILAR ACTS IN ORDER TO PRESERVE OUR RIGHTS AND UPHOLD THE NATIONAL INTEREST
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-12-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02345
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST MANNER THE RECENT HARASSMENT CASE OF THE CHINESE COAST GUARD AGAINST MEMBERS OF THE PHILIPPINE MEDIA AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT TO FILE A PROTEST AGAINST SIMILAR ACTS IN ORDER TO PRESERVE OUR RIGHTS AND UPHOLD THE NATIONAL INTEREST
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
